class.desc: A token helper for constant strings.

desc.p: Updates the matching range and the most recent matching token, which apply to the stream's string.

The range eventually narrows until the values are equal, which then represents matching nothing. But, on the way to nothing, if the new minIndex is on a string that ends on the current char, we have a match.
